title: Veggie Box
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, American, Pizza, Fast food, Take-out, Bakery, Catering
description: A small vegetarian container-based street food establishment serving 85% vegan (otherwise vegetarian) dishes, mainly pizzas and burgers. Daily soup, vegan sirniki and a wide selection of desserts and drinks also available. Opened mid-November 2015.
streetAddress: Ligovsky Prospekt, 74 (Metro Ligovsky Prospekt), Ulitsa Konteinernaya (accessible through the hallway or gates of Ligovsky Prospekt 74
